channel.title: Comments on: Vanilla Poppy Seed Cake with Orange Frosting

item.title: By: Trisha
item.dc:creator: Trisha
item.description: mmmm one of my favourite tea cakes to make! i always make orange & poppyseed cake and it's great with tea! :)
item.content:encoded: mmmm one of my favourite tea cakes to make! i always make orange & poppyseed cake and it’s great with tea! ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Liliana
item.dc:creator: Liliana
item.description: This cake looks amazing! It must taste so delicious with the orange frosting. Thanks for sharing the recipe.
item.content:encoded: This cake looks amazing! It must taste so delicious with the orange frosting. Thanks for sharing the recipe.

item.title: By: Y
item.dc:creator: Y
item.description: Beautiful cake! I love poppyseed cake too.
item.content:encoded: Beautiful cake! I love poppyseed cake too.

item.title: By: lisa (dandysugar)
item.dc:creator: lisa (dandysugar)
item.description: I just love poppyseed cake. This looks amazing, especially with the orange frosting. What a lovely birthday cake for your mom!
item.content:encoded: I just love poppyseed cake. This looks amazing, especially with the orange frosting. What a lovely birthday cake for your mom!

item.title: By: Anita
item.dc:creator: Anita
item.description:
Thanks for the comments :)
Lorraine - I think the soaking is just to soften the seeds a little, I'm not sure whether it makes much difference to the flavour.
Barbara - Thanks, My mum certainly did enjoy her cake (and the rest of her birthday dinner).
Arwen - The subtle icing is lovely and not too overpowering like some of the ones at the shops.
item.content:encoded:
Thanks for the comments ðŸ™‚

Lorraine – I think the soaking is just to soften the seeds a little, I’m not sure whether it makes much difference to the flavour.

Barbara – Thanks, My mum certainly did enjoy her cake (and the rest of her birthday dinner).

Arwen – The subtle icing is lovely and not too overpowering like some of the ones at the shops.

item.title: By: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.dc:creator: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.description: I'd certainly forget to soak the seeds. The sound of the subtle icing sounds good.
item.content:encoded: I’d certainly forget to soak the seeds. The sound of the subtle icing sounds good.

item.title: By: Barbara
item.dc:creator: Barbara
item.description: I'm sure you Mum was very pleased to have such a beautiful, delicious cake made for her!
item.content:encoded: I’m sure you Mum was very pleased to have such a beautiful, delicious cake made for her!

item.title: By: Lorraine @NotQuiteNigella
item.dc:creator: Lorraine @NotQuiteNigella
item.description: Interesting idea Anita about soaking the poppyseeds. I've never done that before, I've just used them straight in a recipe. Does it change the cake very much? It looks great and I agree real Orange juice is better than the flavouring :)
item.content:encoded: Interesting idea Anita about soaking the poppyseeds. I’ve never done that before, I’ve just used them straight in a recipe. Does it change the cake very much? It looks great and I agree real Orange juice is better than the flavouring ðŸ™‚
